# Dotfiles

## Clone

```bash
git clone https://github.com/koozz/dotfiles.git ~/dotfiles
```

## Bootstrap

> [!CAUTION]
> Destructive action
>
> ```bash
> cd ~/dotfiles
> ./bootstrap.sh
> ```

## Brew bundle

> [!CAUTION]
> Destructive action
>
> ```bash
> brew bundle --global --cleanup --force
> ```
